snippet: Jim Delany, the conference’s commissioner, said of moving the event to the Garden, “We wanted to get out there as soon as we could.”
abstract: Big Ten conference chooses to play its 2018 men's basketball tournament at Madison Square Garden.
lead_paragraph: Jim Delany, the conference’s commissioner, said of moving the event to the Garden, “We wanted to get out there as soon as we could.”

headline.main: Big Ten to Hold 2018 Men’s Tournament at Madison Square Garden
headline.print_headline: Big Ten Picks Garden for 2018 Tournament
